com.unvired.ump.agent

Interface ISOAPRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUMPRequest, java.io.Serializable

    public interface ISOAPRequest
extends IUMPRequest
    The interface ISOAPRequest provides a simple abstraction to build a SOAP request 
     Sample code for a SOAP request to read product details.

 
 public void execute(IBusinessProcess process)
 {
 //Initialize the soap request. The proxy objects generated from the Unvired eclipse plugin can be used to create the input xml
 String soapRequestXML = "234";
 String soapResposeXML = "";
 
 //Execute the SOAP request
 ISOAPRequest soapRequest = (ISOAPRequest)process.createRequestObject(RequestType.SOAP);
 soapRequest.setMessage(soapRequestXML);
 ISOAPResponse soapResponse = process.getService().submitSOAPRequest(soapRequest, "COMPANY_NAMESPACE", "FUNCTION_NAME");
 
 //Process the SOAP response
 if(soapResponse.isSuccess())
 soapResposeXML = soapResponse.getResponseMessage();
 }
